Height

# Height

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class            | Support        |
| ---------------- | -------------- |
| ```
h-{n}
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
h-[n]
```    | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
h-full
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
h-screen
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
h-auto
```   | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
h-min
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
h-max
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
| ```
h-fit
```    | 🌐 Web only    |
